title: Educational Enterprise Pvt. Ltd.
text:
One of the oldest and most trusted bookstores in Nepal | Since 1961 A.D.
📚✨ Ignite Your Mind at Educational Enterprise! ✨📚



Looking for your next great read? Whether you’re striving for academic success, diving into personal growth, or escaping into a world of fiction, Educational Enterprise has the perfect book waiting for you.
🎉 From bestselling novels to essential textbooks in medicine, engineering, business, and beyond — our shelves are packed with knowledge, inspiration, and imagination.
🛍️ Visit Us: today and let the learning adventure begin!
📍 109, Saraswati Thaan Marg, Gairidhara, Ward No 2, Kathmandu, 44600, Nepal

title: About
text:
One of the oldest bookstores in Nepal serving since 1961 A.D, Educational Enterprise is a nationally recognized bookseller, distributor, and publisher. We’re passionate about promoting reading culture – and it goes way beyond just selling books.
At Educational Enterprise, providing access to education material to help our customer expand their knowledge is a way of life. We don’t believe age, gender or past actions define you, only your ambition and desire for wholeness… today.
We differentiate ourselves through a combination of unique book selection merged with unequaled standards of quality and authenticity.
